title: The history of the Athenian Society for the resolving all nice and curious questions / by a gentleman who got secret intelligence of thir whole proceedings ; to which are prefixed several poems, written by Mr. Tate, Mr. Motteux, Mr. Richardson, and others.
author: Gildon, Charles, 1665-1724.
publisher: Printed for James Dowley, and are to be sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,
